question: list all redhat repo
answer:
Based on the document content, here are the Red Hat repositories mentioned:

*   `http://SeaHostFactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-server-7.6-x86_64-dvd/`
*   `http://repo.meteorcomm.lan/RedHat/rhel-server-6.x-x86_64-updates/`
*   `http://10.6.0.10/rhel-server-6.7-x86_64-dvd/`
*   `http://10.6.0.10/rhel-server-6.7-i386-dvd/`
*   `http://seahostfactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-server-6.10-x86_64-dvd/`
*   `http://mirror.centos.org/centos/7/os/x86_64/`
*   `http://mirror.centos.org/centos/6/os/i386/`
*    `https://vault.centos.org/6.10/os/x86_64/`
*   `http://seahostfactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-server-7.8-x86_64-dvd/`
*   `http://mirror.centos.org/centos/8/BaseOS/x86_64/os/`
*   `dnf config-manager --add-repo http://seahostfactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-8.1-x86_64-dvd/AppStream`
*  `dnf config-manager --add-repo http://seahostfactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-8.1-x86_64-dvd/BaseOS`
*   `dnf config-manager --add-repo http://seahostfactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-8.2-x86_64-dvd/BaseOS`
*   `dnf config-manager --add-repo http://seahostfactory01.meteorcomm.lan/repos/rhel-8.2-x86_64-dvd/AppStream`
*   `sudo subscription-manager repos --enable codeready-builder-for-rhel-8-x86_64-rpms`

question: how to install java
answer:
To install Java, based on the provided documents, you can follow these steps:

*   **Using yum:**

    *   For Jenkins java upgrade notes, "use the mcc rhel-server-6.x-x86\_64-updates repo to install java 8.  Otherwise, jenkins doesn't work."
    *   `sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo http://repo.meteorcomm.lan/RedHat/rhel-server-6.x-x86_64-updates/`
    *   `sudo yum install java-1.8\*`
*   **General yum install**:
    *   For CTCSM build node setup, use `sudo yum install java-1.8\*`
*   **Within setup script for installing software**
    *   `sudo yum install -y --disablerepo=\* --enablerepo=Sea\* wget cmake boost boost-devel libssh2-devel libuuid-devel libarchive-devel libcurl-devel gmock gmock-devel gtest gtest-devel meld openslp opentracing-cpp-devel prometheus-cpp prometheus-cpp-devel protobuf protobuf-devel protobuf-compiler python-devel zipkin-cpp-opentracing-devel lcov tbb tbb-devel graphviz perl-Digest-MD5 cmake-gmock-module java jpackage-utils sqlite-devel gnutls-devel sshpass jq doxygen java-1.8\* yaml-cpp`
